StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [M8412_Recruit_PME_With_History_Update]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int , @FldName varchar(25)=null , @NewFldValue VARCHAR(25)=NULL , @OldFldValue VARCHAR(25)=NULL , @UserID varchar(15)= null
as SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @SelectStmt VARCHAR(2000)
-- new PME IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT Person_ID FROM M8412_Recruit_PME WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID) BEGIN SET @SelectStmt= 'INSERT INTO M8412_Recruit_PME (Person_ID, Created_By, Modi.ed_By, ' + @FldName + ') VALUES (' + LTRIM(STR(@PersonID)) + ', ''' + @UserID + '''' + ', ''' + @UserID + ''',' + ' CONVERT(char(25), ''' + @NewFldValue + ''',103))' EXEC (@SelectStmt)
END ELSE
-- PME exists, update PME and create history record BEGIN SET @SelectStmt='UPDATE M8412_Recruit_PME SET ' + @FldName IF (ISNULL(LEN(@NewFldValue),0)=0) SET @SelectStmt=@SelectStmt+ '=NULL' ELSE BEGIN SET @SelectStmt=@SelectStmt+ '= CONVERT(char(25),''' + @NewFldValue + ''',103)' END
SET @SelectStmt=@SelectStmt+ ' WHERE PERSON_ID=' + LTRIM(STR(@PersonID)) EXEC (@SelectStmt)
SET @SelectStmt='INSERT INTO M8412_Recruit_PME_History VALUES (' + LTRIM(STR(@PersonID)) + ',''' + @FldName + ''','
IF (ISNULL(LEN(@OldFldValue),0)=0) SET @SelectStmt=@SelectStmt+ 'NULL' ELSE BEGIN SET @SelectStmt=@SelectStmt + ' CONVERT(char(25),''' + @OldFldValue + ''',103)' END IF (ISNULL(LEN(@NewFldValue),0)=0) SET @SelectStmt=@SelectStmt+ ',NULL' ELSE BEGIN SET @SelectStmt=@SelectStmt + ', CONVERT(char(25),''' + @NewFldValue + ''',103)' END SET @SelectStmt=@SelectStmt +', GETDATE(),''' + @UserID+ ''')' EXEC (@SelectStmt)
END
